description:
<p>Connect Healthcare Rotherham CIC are the Rotherham GP Federation. We support all 30 Rotherham GP Practices. Rotherham have pioneered new workforce models and have already seen the benefit of Practice based pharmacists..</p>
<p>The clinical pharmacists provide expertise in medication reviews, support patients to manage long-term conditions through medicines optimisation and improve patient care by increasing communication between general practice, community and hospital pharmacy.</p>
title: Locum Practice Pharmacist Remote Working
